janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumata agramathya ha buddhashasana amathya di.mu. jayarathna mathithuma kathanayakathuman pradhana lak rajayata, aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mathithuman pradhana thriwidha hamuda polis ha siwil aarakshaka hamuda siyalu ranawiruwanata ratawasi siyalu mahajanathawata sethpatha kolambaa dutugamunu shri sawa¢gnyadhathu mandiraya samastha lanka silmatha abhiwruddhi maha sangamaya sanwidhanaya kara atha.dipawyaptha shri sawa¢gnyadhathu, keshadhathu asumaha shrawaka dhathun 3 wana pradarshanaya ha pujawa mema 27 wanadina perawaru 10.00 sita paswaru 4.00 dakwa kurunagala wallawa, thalatuanga gramaye pe්ramawathi shilamatha shramayedi aaramadhipathini rambadagalle khemalatha sil mathawage ha samastha lanka silmatha jathika mandalaye kurunagala disthrik sabhapathi anuradhapuraye piyananda ha lekam hangawa khemasummani maniyan wahansegeda anushasana paridi karmantha ha wanija katayuthu pilibanda niyojya amathya jayarathna herath mahathage pradhanathwayen ha parlimenthu palathsabha nagara ha pradeshiya sabha sabhapathithuman, nagaradhipathithuman ha manthrithumanla, wallawa pradeshiya lekamthuma, wallawa polis sthanadhipathithuman ha polisiya, pradeshaye pasal, daham pasal swechcha samithi sanwidhanayanhi purna dayakathwayen sidu kere.mema maha sarwagnyadhathu pradarshanaya rata wata sanwidhanaya ha sambandhikaranaya karanu labanne samastha lanka silmatha abhiwruddhi maha sangamaye nirmathru/ palaka mandala pradhani widhayaka sabhapathi deshamanya dharmacharya ajith ee.
